languages.text: "Я уже здесь, а значит, официальное расследование Арбитес началось. Так что умерьте пыл, губернатор, вы уже не успеете исправить свои ошибки".
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
languages.original_text: "Я уже здесь, а значит, официальное расследование Арбитес началось. Так что умерьте пыл, губернатор, вы уже не успеете исправить свои ошибки".

traits.locale_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official inquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official inquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official inquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official inquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."
"I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

languages.text: “我就在这里，这意味着法务部已经正式开始调查了。你最好能冷静一下，总督，现在再想纠正错误，恐怕已经来不及了。”
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: “我就在这里，这意味着法务部已经正式开始调查了。你最好能冷静一下，总督，现在再想纠正错误，恐怕已经来不及了。”

languages.text: «Ya estoy aquí, lo que significa que el Adeptus Arbites ha iniciado su investigación oficial. Contenga su entusiasmo, gobernador. Es tarde para rectificar sus errores».
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: «Ya estoy aquí, lo que significa que el Adeptus Arbites ha iniciado su investigación oficial. Contenga su entusiasmo, gobernador. Es tarde para rectificar sus errores».

languages.text: « Je suis déjà ici, ce qui signifie que l'Adeptus Arbites a d'ores et déjà débuté une enquête. Calmez vos ardeurs, gouverneur. Il est déjà trop tard pour rectifier vos erreurs. »
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis déjà ici, ce qui signifie que l'Adeptus Arbites a d'ores et déjà débuté une enquête. Calmez vos ardeurs, gouverneur. Il est déjà trop tard pour rectifier vos erreurs. »

languages.text: 「俺はすでにここにいる。つまり、高等裁定局が正式な調査を開始したということだ。総督、熱意を抑えろ。お前が自らの過ちを正すには、すでに手遅れだ」
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はすでにここにいる。つまり、高等裁定局が正式な調査を開始したということだ。総督、熱意を抑えろ。お前が自らの過ちを正すには、すでに手遅れだ」

languages.text: "Ben zaten buradayım, bu da Adeptus Arbites'in resmî soruşturmasını başlattığı anlamına geliyor. Sakin ol Vali, hatalarını düzeltmek için zaten çok geç kaldın."
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: "Ben zaten buradayım, bu da Adeptus Arbites'in resmî soruşturmasını başlattığı anlamına geliyor. Sakin ol Vali, hatalarını düzeltmek için zaten çok geç kaldın."

languages.text: "Ich bin bereits hier, was bedeutet, dass die Adeptus Arbites ihre offizielle Untersuchung begonnen haben. Ihr könnt Eure Begeisterung zügeln, Gouverneurin – es ist zu spät für eine Korrektur Eurer Fehler."
languages.original_text: "I am already here, which means the Adeptus Arbites has started its official enquiry. You may cool your enthusiasm, Governor — you are already too late to rectify your mistakes."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin bereits hier, was bedeutet, dass die Adeptus Arbites ihre offizielle Untersuchung begonnen haben. Ihr könnt Eure Begeisterung zügeln, Gouverneurin – es ist zu spät für eine Korrektur Eurer Fehler."
